roleset.name: reacting too strongly
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, overreact.01. No VNcls.

example.name: Great Overreactions
example.text: The humor surrounds Pip and his overreaction to everything that happens which he assumes will be connected to his helping the convict.
example.arg: to everything that happens which he assumes will be connected to his helping the convict
